tool_description: This API offers two routes where you'll be able to get the latest news on the World Cup. You can retrieve all news at once or by newspaper.
name: World Cup API with pt-br
title: World Cup API with pt-br

api_list.name: Get news
api_list.description:
This endpoint retrieves news from all the newspapers in the database.

Use parameters "pt-br" for portuguese and "en" for english news.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: insert \\\"pt-br\\\" for portuguese and \\\"en\\\" for english

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cup-api-with-pt-br.p.rapidapi.com/news/en"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cup-api-with-pt-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cup-api-with-pt-br.p.rapidapi.com/news/{language}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cup-api-with-pt-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get news by paper
api_list.description:
This endpoint retrieves news by newspaper.

Use parameters "pt-br" for portuguese and "en" for english news.

Use the name of the paper as a parameter, example:
"https://api-copa-do-mundo.herokuapp.com//news/pt-br/paper/globo"
"https://api-copa-do-mundo.herokuapp.com/news/en/paper/foxsports"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cup-api-with-pt-br.p.rapidapi.com/news/en/paper/foxsports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cup-api-with-pt-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cup-api-with-pt-br.p.rapidapi.com/news/{language}/paper/{newspapername}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cup-api-with-pt-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
